name: Bullet Buddies
description:
NOTE: You have to rename the folder "Bullet Friends_Data" to "BulletBuddies_Data" in order to run this game! I messed up by changing the games name right before submitting and forgot to check that it still worked.

A game made for Wowie Jam 2022.

Bullet Buddies is a short and simple shooter where the bullets are "clever" and you have to work with your bullets to survive.
